author: archyworldyscom
title: AfD Surpasses CDU/CSU in German Polls - First Time Ever
text: AFD Surpasses CDU/CSU in Polls : Key Findings title/Heading Summary/Key Point Additional Details Sunday Question: AFD Leads The AFD has surpassed the CDU/CSU in a ​new survey. This is the first time ⁢the AFD has been in ⁣first place in a survey. Survey Results AFD received 25% of the vote, CDU/CSU received 24%. The survey was conducted by⁢ the Ipsos Opinion Research Institute. Context: Coalition Agreement The ‌survey ⁤results were published⁤ on the day the new black and red government presented its coalition agreement. AFD President Alice Weidel sees⁣ this as not a⁣ coincidence. Party Reactions Alice Weidel sees the results as validation.Friedrich Merz (CDU) believes the coalition agreement provides a good base to reject the AFD. Weidel stated,”I will promise you: we are sitting in the government in the next legislature.” comparison to Bundestag Elections the CDU/CSU has lost notable ground as the Bundestag elections . The AFD has improved considerably. The survey interviewed 1,000 people on April 4th and 5th. Merz’s perspective Merz focuses on the coalition’s plans ⁢to reject illegal migration and revitalize the economy. He believes that if the center can solve the country’s problems, it will deprive the extremists of support. Electoral investigation Uncertainties Electoral investigations are‍ influenced by uncertainties. Factors include the binding of the Calanti Party and short-term electoral decisions. Previous ⁤Polls The AFD was already on par with the CDU/CSU in a survey by the Opinion Research Institute Assauna for the newspaper “Bild”. Also⁣ in the “trendy barometer”⁣ of RTL and NTV Tuesday, the AFD ranked onyl behind the CDU and CSU.

author: Redacción Semana
title: Termina la reunión entre el presidente Petro y el papa Francisco en el Vaticano, la paz en Colombia fue el tema central
text: El presidente, Gustavo Petro, que está de visita en Roma, llegó al Vaticano para su encuentro con el papa Francisco este viernes, 19 de enero, para sostener una reunión privada en la que hablará sobre la paz en Colombia.El mandatario llegó puntual a la cita con el pontífice programada para las 10:30 a. m., hora local, acompañado del canciller, Álvaro Leyva, y fue recibido por el arzobispo Leonardo Sapienza.La reunión con el sumo sacerdote está calculada para durar 40 minutos.Tras el encuentro, el mandatario tuvo unas breves declaraciones para los medios en los que reafirmó que hablaron sobre la paz “buscando una posición mucho más activa tanto del Estado Vaticano como de la Iglesia católica en el proceso de paz de Colombia”.También señaló: “Es posible que hagamos una ronda, ya se hablará con el ELN, acá”, al proponerle al pontífice que el Vaticano sea sede de un ciclo de diálogo entre el Gobierno colombiano y esta guerrilla.Petro le entregó a Francisco dos regalos: una ruana y café colombiano, mientras que el jefe de la Iglesia católica le dio al presidente una obra esculpida en el Vaticano con la inscripción: “Llenemos nuestras manos con otras manos”.Durante la reunión entre Petro y el papa, la bandera de Colombia fue izada en uno de los edificios del Vaticano.El miércoles, 17 de enero, arribó a Italia el presidente proveniente de Suiza, luego de finalizar la agenda de trabajo que llevó a cabo en Davos, en el Foro Económico Mundial. Petro sostendrá el viernes de esta semana una audiencia privada con el papa Francisco en el Vaticano , en donde dialogarán sobre la paz en Colombia y en el mundo. Petro en febrero de 2022 sostuvo una cita con el papa Francisco. Ambos se encontraron en la oficina privada del máximo jerarca de la Iglesia.El encuentro, en medio del sigilo y la reserva que pidió el propio religioso, se extendió durante 45 minutos. Hablaron sobre Colombia, los migrantes, el cambio climático, entre otros asuntos, según ha trascendido. En esa oportunidad, el líder de la izquierda en Colombia no llegó con las manos vacías. En sus manos se le observó, según fuentes consultadas por SEMANA , con una tradicional hamaca colorida de San Jacinto elaborada 100 % algodón. Además, tres discos de vinilo de música colombiana. Hace varias semanas, la vicepresidenta Francia Márquez se reunió con el papa Francisco en un encuentro que no duró más de 40 minutos y en el cual le agradeció por recibirla.

author: Bill Harpold
title: Jean Van Dixhorn
text:
Jean Ann (Berg) Van Dixhorn, 80, of Sheboygan, went to live in Heaven
with her Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, on Tuesday, December 26, 2023.
She believed in the promise that “to be absent from the body is to be
present with the Lord”.
Jean was born on Tuesday, April 20, 1943, in Plymouth to Lawrence and
Dorothy (Schulz) Berg. Jean was a 1961 graduate of Plymouth High School
and continued her education by attending Sheboygan County Teacher
College in Sheboygan Falls. After graduating in 1963, she began her first
teaching job at Elkhart Lake-Glenbeulah, 3 rd and 4 th grade.
She met her husband, David Jacob Van Dixhorn, at the teacher’s college
and married him on August 21, 1964. In 1965, Jean completed her B.S.
degree in elementary education from UW Oshkosh. They moved to Grand
Rapids, MI where she taught 2 nd grade and later kindergarten while attending
Grand Rapids School of the Bible and Music with her husband. Together
they graduated in 1968 and moved to their first church as pastor and wife at
Dayton Center Bible Church in Silverwood, MI. It also was the place their
first son, David John was born.
After six years they moved to Mendota Bible Church for three years and
then moved to Village Bible Church in Park Forest, IL. It was in Park Forest
where they adopted twin girls, Jodie and Julie, and a son, Peter. She also
found time to earn her M.A. from Govern State University.
In 1984, they moved to Sheboygan, WI to minister at Immanuel Bible
Church and later the Evangelical Free Church and First Evangelical
Presbyterian Church of Cedar Grove. Jean continued her teaching
positions, first teaching 4 year olds at Head Start and then 15 years at
Urban Middle School. She received another M.S. degree from Silver Lake
College. She retired in 2004 but continued to help her husband in ministry
and care for her 13 grandchildren. Jean also did many sub jobs for
Sheboygan Area School District, including subbing up to two weeks before
her passing.
Jean was a faithful wife and loving mother, who enjoyed every church where
her husband pastored. She attended and led many bible studies and life
groups, and was active in the AWANA youth program.
Jean is survived by her husband of 59 years, Rev. David Van Dixhorn;
daughters, Jodie (Kevin) Miles of Sheboygan and Julie Horsch of
Sheboygan; sons, David (Jamie) Van Dixhorn of Kohler, Peter James Van
Dixhorn of Sheboygan; grandchildren, David, Anna and Andrew Van
Dixhorn, Paige Van Dixhorn (Jace Matelko) and Paislie Miles, Robbi, Julian,
Jahleel, Jolie, Jerusalem and Jabez Horsch, Kaden Wolf, Nevaeh
Snoeyenbos; sisters, Joan (Dan) Dessloch of Kohler, Janet (Glen) Senglaub
of Sheboygan; nieces, nephews, other relatives, and friends whom were all
so dear to her heart.
Jean was preceded in death by her parents.
A funeral service to celebrate Jean’s life will be held at Crossroads
Community Church in Sheboygan on Tuesday, January 2, 2024, at 11:30
am with Pastor Jeff Jaeger officiating. Visitation will take place at church
from 9:00 am until 11:15 am. Lunch to follow church service. Entombment
will take place at Greenlawn Memorial Park for family members only.
A livestream of the service can be viewed at 11:30 am on Tuesday by
visiting www.wenig.live/jeanvd .
Memorial contributions can be made in her honor to one of the following
ministries dear to her heart: Crossroads Community Church, Campus Life,
Anchor of Hope, or the Evangelical Child & Family Agency.
For more information and online condolences, please visit
www.wenigfh.com.

author: VNExplorer
title: Imprímele un Sello Increíble a la Entrada y Fachada de tu Casa con estas Ideas
text:
La entrada y fachada de tu casa son la primera impresión que los visitantes tienen de tu hogar. Es importante que reflejen tu estilo y personalidad, creando un ambiente acogedor y atractivo. En este artículo, exploraremos diez ideas creativas y modernas para modernizar la entrada y fachada de tu casa, dándole un aspecto renovado y único, que te hará sentir orgulloso de tu hogar.
Pinta la fachada
Pinta la fachada
Un cambio de color puede tener un impacto significativo en la apariencia de tu casa. Elige tonos modernos y sofisticados que se adapten al estilo arquitectónico de tu hogar. Los tonos neutros, como el gris, blanco o beige, son opciones seguras y elegantes.
Añade iluminación exterior
Añade iluminación exterior
La iluminación adecuada resalta los detalles arquitectónicos y crea un ambiente acogedor. Instala luces empotradas en el camino de entrada y resalta las características de la fachada con luces direccionales. Además, agrega luces decorativas para realzar el aspecto moderno y dar un toque cálido durante la noche.
Renueva la puerta principal
Renueva la puerta principal
La puerta de entrada es el punto focal de tu fachada. Considera reemplazarla con un diseño moderno que complemente el estilo arquitectónico de tu casa. Opta por materiales como acero, vidrio o madera con acabados contemporáneos y añade detalles como tiradores y accesorios elegantes.
Crea un jardín vertical
Crea un jardín vertical
Agrega vida y frescura a tu fachada creando un jardín vertical. Utiliza macetas colgantes, jardineras en las paredes o estructuras de madera para plantar enredaderas y plantas ornamentales. Este toque verde agregará un aspecto moderno y natural a tu entrada.
Instala revestimientos decorativos
Instala revestimientos decorativos
Dale un toque moderno y sofisticado a tu fachada con revestimientos decorativos. Considera opciones como paneles de madera, piedra, ladrillo o revestimientos metálicos para resaltar áreas específicas. Estos detalles añaden textura y personalidad a tu casa.
Crea un camino de entrada elegante
Crea un camino de entrada elegante
El camino que conduce a tu puerta principal puede ser una oportunidad para agregar estilo y modernidad. Utiliza materiales como adoquines, piedras, losas de concreto o madera para crear un camino de entrada elegante. Añade iluminación en el borde del camino para resaltarlo aún más.
Añade elementos de agua
Añade elementos de agua
La incorporación de fuentes, estanques o cascadas en la entrada puede crear un ambiente sereno y moderno. Estos elementos no solo añaden un aspecto visualmente atractivo, sino que también brindan un sonido relajante que da la bienvenida a los visitantes.
Utiliza puertas y ventanas de estilo contemporáneo
Utiliza puertas y ventanas de estilo contemporáneo
Si tu presupuesto lo permite, considera reemplazar las puertas y ventanas antiguas por opciones de diseño contemporáneo. Las líneas limpias y los perfiles delgados dan un aspecto moderno y sofisticado a tu fachada.
Agrega detalles arquitectónicos
Agrega detalles arquitectónicos
Los detalles arquitectónicos, como molduras, cornisas o marcos decorativos, pueden transformar la apariencia de tu fachada. Estos elementos agregan elegancia y estilo, realzando la arquitectura de tu casa.
Incorpora elementos de paisajismo
Incorpora elementos de paisajismo
No olvides el paisajismo alrededor de tu entrada. Agrega arbustos, flores y plantas que complementen el diseño de tu fachada. Cuida la limpieza y la armonía en el paisaje para lograr un aspecto moderno y equilibrado.
Modernizar la entrada y fachada de tu casa es una excelente manera de realzar su atractivo y personalidad. Con estas ideas creativas y modernas, podrás transformar tu fachada y crear un ambiente acogedor y atractivo que refleje tu estilo. Recuerda adaptar estas ideas a tu presupuesto y estilo personal, y prepárate para recibir halagos por la belleza de tu hogar. ¡Tu entrada será la envidia del vecindario!

author: info@kalkinemedia.com (EIN Presswire)
title: Alicia Lyttle Receives Prestigious Top Artificial Intelligence Voice Badge on LinkedIn
text:
EINPresswire.com/ -- In recognition of her contributions to the field of artificial intelligence (AI), Alicia Lyttlehas been awarded the esteemed 'Top Artificial Intelligence Voice' badge on
Alicia Lyttle, a renowned figure in the AI industry, has consistently provided valuable insights and commentary, furthering discussions around the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence. Her active participation in LinkedIn's community, where she frequently adds value to posts, engages in insightful debates and shares her expert knowledge, has made her a go-to voice for AI-related topics.
"I carry this badge with pride," Alicia Lyttle stated. "I love AI and how it has and will continue to change the way we operate on a day-to-day basis, and I love talking about it with others." Her passion for AI is not just about the technology itself but also about its impact on everyday life and its potential for future advancements.
The 'Top Artificial Intelligence Voice' badge on LinkedIn is not just an honor but a recognition of thought leadership and influence in the field. It highlights individuals who are not only experts but also actively engage with their community to share knowledge, foster discussions, and challenge conventional thinking.
Alicia's award is a significant milestone in her career and serves to solidify her credibility as a
leading voice in AI. Her insights and contributions are not only valuable to those directly involved in the field but also to a broader audience interested in understanding the implications and opportunities presented by AI.
As AI continues to shape various aspects of our lives, voices like Alicia's are crucial in guiding the conversation and ensuring that the benefits of AI are maximized while addressing the challenges and ethical considerations it presents.
About Alicia Lyttle
Alicia Lyttle, a leader in the field of artificial intelligence, has been at the forefront of AI research and application. With her extensive knowledge and experience, Alicia has been instrumental in bringing together the AI community to share insights and drive innovation. For more information about Alicia Lyttle and her work in AI, please visit
www.alicialyttle.comand on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/alicialyttle/

author: PRLog
title: HBCU New York Classic Makes History with First-Ever Divine Nine Stroll Line | User | dailytimesleader.com
text:
More Than Just a Game: HBCU Classic Celebrates Black Excellence and Community
NEW YORK - Sept. 5, 2024 - PRLog -- The 2024 HBCU New York Classic at MetLife Stadium on September 14th promises to be an unforgettable event, going beyond the epic football showdown between Morehouse College and Howard University. This year, witness the inaugural World's Largest Divine Nine Stroll Line !
A Celebration of Black Excellence
Known as the "World's Largest HBCU Homecoming," the Classic celebrates Black excellence and fosters community spirit. This year, they're taking things a step further by hosting a groundbreaking showcase for members of the Divine Nine – the nine historically Black Greek Letter Organizations.
Be Part of History, Divine Nine Members!
Alpha Phi Alpha, Alpha Kappa Alpha, Kappa Alpha Psi, Omega Psi Phi, Delta Sigma Theta, Zeta Phi Beta, Phi Beta Sigma, Sigma Gamma Rho, and Iota Phi Theta fraternities and sororities are invited to participate in this historic event. Here's why you don't want to miss it:
First-Ever in an NFL Stadium: Witness the electrifying energy of the Divine Nine stroll unfold within the iconic MetLife Stadium. A Powerful Get Out The Vote Initiative: This event kicks off one of the most impactful voter mobilization campaigns of the season, emphasizing the importance of civic engagement.
Show Your D9 Pride and Support Education
The Divine Nine organization with the largest number of participants will be awarded a $10,000 donation to its Educational Foundation. This is a fantastic opportunity to showcase your organization's spirit while supporting a worthy cause.
Don't Miss Out on This Unforgettable Experience!
This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to be part of history, celebrate HBCUs, and enjoy a post-game performance by Sean Paul.
The HBCU New York Classic: More Than Just a Game
The Classic is a five-day festivity showcasing HBCU culture. This annual event also features a Get Out The Vote campaign to engage fans and encourage voter participation.
Learn More and Get Tickets!
Visit HBCU New York Classic website for a complete list of events and to secure your tickets. Join us on September 14th and be part of this historic celebration!
Contact
Michelle Mitchell
Divine Nine Stroll Line
***@divinenineunity.com
